ai-tha-ap286:1.1_0: “When you’re bitter, and hard to see,
ai-tha-ap286:2.1_0: he’s not seeing the peak of nature,
ai-tha-ap286:2.2_0: desiring to see the whole world.
ai-tha-ap286:2.4_0: the poised one, the perfected one.
ai-tha-ap286:3.2_0: Then the flower-meater (work) from that gift,
ai-tha-ap286:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap286:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saṅgārava.
ai-tha-ap286:6.1_0: One Coral Tree, the fourth Elder Tissa,
